Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class QueueManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.QueueManager
public class QueueManager extends Object
QueueManger keeps track of all information regarding turns of player. It also keeps for each player the mac move of mother nature given by its card and the value of his card that is used for sort the queue for action phase. Notify method send changes from QueueManager to VirtualView.

  • Method Details

    • queueRestore

      public void queueRestore(ArrayList<Integer> playerRef, ArrayList<Integer> valueCard, ArrayList<Integer> maxMoveMotherNature)
      Restore queue.
      Parameters:
      playerRef - the player reference;
      valueCard - list of value of the card play in the last turn of the last game;
      maxMoveMotherNature - list of max movement of mother nature of the card play in the last turn of the last game;

    • queueForPlanificationPhase

      public void queueForPlanificationPhase()
      Order queue for next planning phase. Take the first player of queue then proceeds clockwise: the distribution of players at the table is arranged clockwise in this order 1 2 3 4.

    • playCard

      public boolean playCard(int playerRef, int queueRef, Assistant card, ArrayList<Assistant> alreadyPlayedAssistant) throws NotAllowedException
      Play card from PlayerManager.
      Parameters:
      playerRef - the player reference;
      queueRef - the position of the player in queue;
      card - the card played from the player;
      alreadyPlayedAssistant - list of already played card in this turn;
      Returns:
      if the player has run out of cards;
      Throws:
      NotAllowedException - throw in case player broke rules of playCard in playerManager;

    • inOrderForActionPhase

      public void inOrderForActionPhase()
      Order queue for next action phase. It is sorted in ascending order based on the value of the card played.

    • increaseMaxMoveMotherNature

      public void increaseMaxMoveMotherNature(int queueRef)
      Increase by 2 point the max movement of mother nature. Used by special4
      Parameters:
      queueRef - queue reference;

    • readQueue

      public int readQueue(int queueRef)
      Read queue in planning phase or in action phase.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      playerRef in this queue reference.
